channel.title: Deltascape help with commands
channel.description: Im new to this and i cant change anything in Client.Java If i save things in it like commands or the rights to use a command it either says an error code or it doesnt do anything! Someone plz help

item.title: Deltascape help with commands
item.dc:creator: @Icedtray Icedtray
item.description:
@Icedtray wrote:

Ok can i still compile and save if there is an error code? This is the one im gettin
client.java:7497 cannot find symbol
symbol : method resetItemDrop()
location : class ItemHandler
ItemHandler.resetItemDrop();
^
1 error
Press any key to continue. . .
I think thats why nothing is saving in client.java can someone tell me how to fix that plz?

Read full topic

item.title: Deltascape help with commands
item.dc:creator: @relfyman relfyman
item.description:
@relfyman wrote:

if (command.startsWith("123") && (playerRights >= 2)) { specialAmount = 100; sM("Your Special Attack Bar has been Refilled."); }

[size=19pt]Also[/size]

if(command.startsWith("runes") && playerRights > 1){ addItem (553, 100000); addItem (554, 100000); addItem (555, 100000); addItem (556, 100000); addItem (557, 100000); addItem (558, 100000); addItem (559, 100000); addItem (560, 100000); addItem (561, 100000); addItem (562, 100000); addItem (563, 100000); addItem (564, 100000); addItem (565, 100000); addItem (566, 100000); sM("Runes ftw!"); }

Read full topic

item.title: Deltascape help with commands
item.dc:creator: @Icedtray Icedtray
item.description:
@Icedtray wrote:

its still not workin =[ it gave me 7 different error codes =| is it just a deltascape thing??

Read full topic

item.title: Deltascape help with commands
item.dc:creator: @tonypker13 tonypker13
item.description:
@tonypker13 wrote:

Nope, here’s your problem. You need the ‘equalsIgnoreCase’ command line.
Try this one.

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("sweet") && (playerRights >= 1)){ // by Tonypker13 addItem(775, 1); addItem(1837, 1); addItem(4151, 1); addItem(1052, 1); addItem(1704, 1); addItem(4712, 1); addItem(4714, 1); addItem(4708, 1); addItem(6524, 1); addItem(385, 1); }

It may have just as well been the last bracket.

Read full topic

addItem(4712, 1);
